 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Documentary series following life on-board the aircraft carrier HMS Illustrious. Problems plague Illustrious's departure from Portsmouth.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Documentary series following life on-board the aircraft carrier HMS Illustrious. The sailors undergo a battle-readiness inspection and the ship finally leaves British waters.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Documentary series filmed on-board the aircraft carrier HMS Illustrious. In this episode, Illustrious negotiates the treacherous Suez Canal; and a sailor goes missing.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Documentary series filmed on-board the aircraft carrier HMS Illustrious. The crew host a dinner for naval royalty; the awesome Harrier jump jets arrive; and love is in the air.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Documentary series filmed on-board the aircraft carrier HMS Illustrious. In the Indian Ocean, RAF pilots practise landing on the flight deck of the ship.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Documentary series filmed on-board an aircraft carrier. The ship reaches the easternmost point of its journey; and a nuclear submarine arrives for some training exercises.

imdb.plot outline: Warship is a British documentary series produced by Channel 5 about the Royal Navy. The series features two Navy ships and documents the daily routines of the crew on board during a deployment or exercise. The first series focused on the lives of the crew on board the aircraft carrier HMS Illustrious. The second series was filmed on the amphibious warfare ships HMS Bulwark and HMS Ocean during a six-month exercise in 2009.
imdb.title: Warship
plot: _Warship_ (qv) is a British documentary series produced by Channel 5 about the Royal Navy. The series features two Navy ships and documents the daily routines of the crew on board during a deployment or exercise. The first series focused on the lives of the crew on board the aircraft carrier HMS Illustrious. The second series was filmed on the amphibious warfare ships HMS Bulwark and HMS Ocean during a six-month exercise in 2009.::raytalbot-11041
